Index >  LogLevel

LogLevel

Description

Returns or sets the log level for debugging.

Data type

<short>

Syntax

.LogLevel = 1;

Remarks

The default value for LogLevel is 0 which means the extra information for debugging won't be logged.
To log the information for debugging, you can set it to 1.

For more info on how to use this property, you can check out How to catch detailed information by using LogLevel Property.
